description: This file defines the routes for a 'todos' REST API, setting up HTTP endpoints for CRUD operations, input validation, and delegating to respective controller handlers.

methods.name: <anonymous>
methods.description: Route handler for GET /api/todos that validates query params and invokes listTodosHandler

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Middleware to validate request body against provided schema

methods.name: createTodoHandler
methods.description: Controller function to create a new todo

methods.name: getTodoHandler
methods.description: Controller function to get a specific todo by id

methods.name: putTodoHandler
methods.description: Controller function to replace an existing todo

methods.name: patchTodoHandler
methods.description: Controller function to partially update a todo

methods.name: deleteTodoHandler
methods.description: Controller function to delete a todo
